translated: Elder Story🔽The Chapter with Paduma and Kesara
“I saw a disciple of the Buddha,
the one who sees what is beneficial,
while he was doing new work,

analyzed: niṭṭhite nava kamme ca  anulepamadā saha
translated: When the new work was finished,🔽I gave him a smear of ointment,
in the unsurpassed field of merit.
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving a smear of ointment.
The Buddha’s instruction has been carried out.”🔽Thus the elder Anulepadayaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā anulepadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Anulepadāyakattherassāpadānaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai anulepadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽anulepadāyaka therassa apadānam aṭṭhama
translated: The Elder Anulepadayaka’s Story is the eighth.
